str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Apparently a primary word; an 'hour'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
And, even, also, namely.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
True (lit: made of truth), real, genuine. From alethes; truthful.
A worshipper. From proskuneo; an adorer.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Wind, breath, spirit.
And, even, also, namely.
From alethes; truth.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
